thread.title: RFK Racing and Castrol Renew Partnership for Enhanced Performance and Innovation
thread.title_full: RFK Racing and Castrol Renew Partnership for Enhanced Performance and Innovation

author: world today news
title: RFK Racing and Castrol Renew Partnership for Enhanced Performance and Innovation
text:
RFK Racing and Castrol Extend Partnership⁤ into 2025 NASCAR Season wiht expanded Collaboration
‍
RFK Racing ‍has announced the continuation of‌ its⁢ partnership with Castrol ,​ a relationship that has been a cornerstone of the team’s ⁤success since 2019. The renewal,​ which extends into the 2025 NASCAR season and beyond, marks‍ the sixth year of collaboration between the two iconic brands. This year’s partnership also includes ⁢an expanded role for TravelCenters of ​America ⁤(TA) ,⁤ part of the bp‌ portfolio, ‌further ⁣solidifying the alliance.
“For years now, ⁤Castrol has been ‍an integral⁣ part ⁤of our​ success ⁣both on and ⁤off the track,” ⁣said Steve Newmark, President of‍ RFK Racing. “From product superiority to collaborations⁤ around sustainability and content with ⁣the​ family of castrol drivers and Ford Motor company,⁤ Castrol has ensured we operate at peak performance ⁣and powered ​us through several years of success.”
The partnership renewal comes as RFK Racing expands ​its operations,adding a third team ‌with Ryan Preece and the No. 60 car. This move ‍underscores the team’s commitment⁣ to innovation and performance, leveraging Castrol’s cutting-edge products to push the ​boundaries of ⁤speed and efficiency on‍ the track. ⁣
A Legacy of ‍Innovation and Performance Castrol, a brand with over ​125 years of history, has consistently evolved its products to meet the demands of⁣ extreme ‌conditions. As RFK Racing’s official oil partner, ‍Castrol has played a pivotal role in the team’s⁢ achievements, including the use ⁣of Castrol MoreCircular ⁢engine oils ‌ since 2022. These oils, tested‍ in the harshest racing environments, have ​proven critical to RFK’s success.
“RFK has​ been at the forefront of innovation, testing and winning races with our Castrol ⁢MoreCircular engine oils since 2022,”‌ said Andreas⁣ Osbar, ⁣CEO ‌of Castrol Americas. “Putting ⁢our products ⁢to the test in extreme ‍racing⁤ conditions has been critical, and I’m grateful to the iconic RFK Racing team for their partnership.”
Fan-Favorite​ Designs ‍and New Product Launches The partnership ⁣renewal also brings the unveiling of the 2025 Castrol and TravelCenters of america⁣ schemes, ‌which have consistently been a hit ‍with fans. These designs ⁢will feature‍ a co-branded car scheme highlighting the launch of Castrol CRB® Multi and Castrol VECTON® heavy-duty diesel engine oil, available at TA ‌Truck​ Service centers nationwide.
The 2025 schemes are expected ⁢to build on the success of ⁤previous⁢ designs,which were celebrated in RFK’s recent 2024 designs bracket tournament .⁤
Key Highlights of the RFK Racing and Castrol ‌Partnership | ⁢ aspect ⁢ ⁤ ‍ | ⁤ Details ‌ ⁤ ‍ ⁢ ​ ‌‌ ⁤ ⁤ ​ ⁤ ​ ‌ ⁤ ⁢ |
| –| –|
| Partnership Duration | Since⁢ 2019, renewed‌ through 2025​ and beyond ⁤ ‌ ‍​ ⁣ |
|‍ Key⁣ Products ⁢ | Castrol MoreCircular engine⁤ oils, Castrol CRB®​ Multi, Castrol⁤ VECTON® | ‍
| New Additions ​ ​ | Expanded collaboration with TravelCenters of‌ America (TA) ⁢ ​⁤ ⁤ ‍​ |
| Team Expansion ⁣ | Addition‍ of ryan Preece and the No.‌ 60 car ⁣ ‍ ⁤ ⁢| ⁣⁢
| Fan engagement ‌ ‍ | 2025 Castrol and TA schemes unveiled,​ building on fan-favorite designs |
Looking Ahead The renewed ‌partnership​ between RFK ‍Racing and⁤ Castrol is a testament to the ‍shared commitment‌ to innovation, performance, and sustainability.As the 2025 NASCAR season approaches, fans can expect to see the iconic Castrol and⁣ TA brands‍ prominently displayed on the track, ⁢driving both speed‌ and success. ⁢ ‌
“We’re thankful to not only their domestic brand ⁤team, but ⁣the global bp team for continuing to trust us to ⁤promote their ‍business,” added Newmark. With this​ renewed alliance, RFK racing and Castrol are poised to continue their legacy⁤ of‍ excellence in‍ the world of motorsports.
Castrol and RFK Racing continue Winning Partnership in 2025 NASCAR Season The partnership between Castrol and ⁢ RFK Racing continues to thrive ‍as the‍ 2025‌ NASCAR season kicks off ⁤with high expectations. The collaboration, which ‌has already yielded six victories ⁢in the NextGen era, ⁣including three playoff appearances,⁣ is set to expand ‌its reach both on and off the track. ​
Debi Boffa, CEO of TravelCenters of America (TA) , expressed enthusiasm about the partnership, stating, “This showcases the great affinity ‍of the Castrol ⁣and TA⁢ brands⁢ on a national stage, and RFK Racing is a‍ brilliant partner that offers ⁢an⁣ exciting⁤ and engaging ⁢platform for us to showcase the two brands‍ together.‌ We look forward to working with Chris ⁢ Buescher ⁢ and the entire RFK team again in 2025.”
‍
In addition to their on-track ‍success, Castrol is leveraging its partnership⁣ with TA to ⁤introduce castrol Heavy ⁤Duty Lubricants to fleet customers and professional drivers at TA Truck Service locations. These products, known for their superior performance and reliability, are expected​ to enhance the operational efficiency of commercial⁤ fleets nationwide.
A Winning ‌Legacy The ‌2024 season⁤ marked a⁤ significant ⁢milestone for ⁤Castrol ​and RFK racing‌ when brad Keselowski piloted the No. ⁤6 Ford Mustang Dark ‍Horse ​to victory lane in the throwback Castrol TOM’s supra livery. This win not only highlighted the strength of the partnership but‌ also marked⁤ the first victory for the new‍ Ford Mustang Dark Horse in NASCAR competition.
As joining forces,Castrol has been a key contributor to RFK Racing’s success,powering the team to six victories and​ multiple playoff appearances. The 2025 season promises to‍ build on this momentum, with Castrol set to ⁣make⁤ its debut⁤ on Keselowski’s No. 6 ford at the Circuit of the Americas ‍(COTA) on March 2, followed by another primary event at Las Vegas Motor Speedway two weeks later.
Expanding Beyond ⁣the Track The collaboration between castrol‍ and‌ TA​ extends beyond ⁣the⁢ racetrack, with a focus on delivering high-performance products to the trucking ⁢industry. the introduction‍ of Castrol Heavy Duty⁣ Lubricants at TA Truck Service locations⁤ underscores⁣ the brands’ commitment to supporting professional ⁣drivers and fleet operators. “We are also ⁢excited to now provide the top-of-the-line castrol Heavy⁢ Duty Lubricants product, known for⁢ their superior performance and reliability, to our ⁤fleet customers and professional⁢ driver​ guests at​ our TA Truck Service locations,” added Boffa.
Key Highlights of the Castrol-RFK Partnership | Aspect ⁢ ⁢ ‍ ⁣ | Details ⁢ ⁢ ‍ ‌ ​ ⁢⁣ ⁣ ⁢ ⁢‌ ‍ ​ ‌ ⁣|
| –| –|
| Victories ‌| 6 wins in the NextGen era, including 3 playoff appearances ⁣ ⁢ ⁤ |
| 2024 Highlight ⁣ ​ ⁣ ‍ | Brad Keselowski’s victory in‌ the Castrol TOM’s Supra livery ‌ ‌ ‍ |
| 2025 Debut ⁣ |‌ Circuit of the Americas (March 2) ⁤ ​ ​ ​ ⁣ ‌ ‍ ⁣ ⁢ ​ ⁣ |
| Product⁣ Expansion |⁢ Castrol ⁢Heavy Duty Lubricants⁤ at TA Truck Service ‌locations ⁣ ⁤ |
|​ Key driver ⁢ ⁤ ⁣ |​ Brad Keselowski ‍(No. 6 Ford⁢ Mustang Dark Horse) ⁣ ‍ ​ ‌ ⁢ ⁢ ‌ |
Looking Ahead As the 2025 season unfolds, fans ⁣can expect to see the iconic Castrol branding on Keselowski’s No. 6 Ford at key races,including COTA and Las Vegas.The ⁤partnership’s success⁤ on ​the track, combined⁤ with​ its growing ⁣influence in the trucking industry, highlights the synergy‍ between Castrol, ⁣TA,‍ and RFK Racing.‌
With a proven track record of performance and innovation, the Castrol-RFK ⁣Racing alliance is poised to deliver more thrilling moments and industry-leading solutions in‍ the years to come.
For more updates on the 2025 NASCAR season and the latest ⁢from RFK Racing, visit Speedway Digest . ⁣
—
Stay tuned for more exciting developments as Castrol and RFK Racing continue to ⁣push ​the limits​ of performance⁤ both on and ⁢off the ⁢track. # RFK Racing Unveils 2025‍ NASCAR Cup Series⁢ Lineup:⁣ Keselowski,⁢ Buescher, and Preece Gear Up for ‌a Thrilling season
The 2025 NASCAR ⁣Cup Series season is shaping up to⁣ be one of the most exciting yet, and RFK Racing ‌is ready to ‌make its ⁢mark. With a ‌star-studded lineup featuring ⁤Brad Keselowski,Chris Buescher,and Ryan ⁣Preece,the team‌ is⁢ poised to deliver high-octane performances​ across ⁤iconic‌ tracks.
## Keselowski’s Quest‍ for ‍Glory
Brad Keselowski, the 2012 Cup Champion,⁤ enters his 16th full season in the NASCAR Cup Series ​and⁤ his fourth ‍as Co-Owner/Driver at RFK ‌Racing. Fresh ⁢off his 10th appearance in the NASCAR Playoffs, Keselowski is third among active drivers in total⁣ wins with ⁤36 victories.
Keselowski‍ will⁣ defend his⁣ Darlington spring win on April ‌6, piloting ⁣the Castrol Ford. “The 2012 ‍Cup champion‌ will defend his Darlington spring win in‍ the Castrol Ford,” the team confirmed. His⁢ season kicks off at Phoenix​ Raceway on March 16, ​setting the stage for what promises to be a ⁤thrilling campaign.
## buescher’s ​Momentum on High Banks
Chris Buescher, a consistent force in the NextGen⁢ car era, enters ​his 10th ​season in the Cup Series. With five wins to his name, Buescher has proven his mettle on challenging tracks. This year, he’ll take the wheel ​of the TravelCenters of America Ford at Talladega on ‍April 27,​ a ‌track were RFK Racing ​has come tantalizingly close to victory in recent years.
The TravelCenters brand will also feature in a co-branded scheme with Castrol at the‌ Bristol Night Race on‌ September 13, with Keselowski behind the wheel of‌ the No. 6 ⁤car.
## preece’s New Chapter⁢ ⁤
Ryan Preece, embarking on his sixth full season‌ in ⁤the Cup Series, will⁢ make‌ his debut in ⁤the Castrol Ford at ⁣Michigan on June 8. ⁤Preece’s No. 60⁢ car will also showcase the Castrol brand⁣ at Martinsville ​on October 26, adding another ‍layer of excitement ⁢to ⁤his​ season.
Castrol’s presence will be ⁢felt throughout the year,‌ with ⁣primary⁤ sponsorships at key races, including Mexico ⁢City (June 15), Sonoma (July 13), Dover (July 20), and Indianapolis (July 27). The brand​ will‌ also ⁤feature prominently in the ‍playoffs, with primaries ‌at the ‍ROVAL⁢ on October ​5 and Phoenix on November 2. ​
## Key races‍ and Sponsorships
Here’s a swift look ​at RFK Racing’s 2025 highlights: ⁣
| Driver ​ ⁣ | Key Races ‍ ​ ‌ ​ ⁣ | Sponsorship ⁣ ⁢ ‍ |
| –| | –|‌
| ⁤Brad ‌Keselowski‍ | Darlington (April 6), ⁢Bristol Night Race (Sept. 13) | Castrol, TravelCenters of America‌ | ⁢
| Chris Buescher | ⁤Talladega (April 27) ⁣ ⁢ ‍ | TravelCenters of America |‌ ⁤
| Ryan Preece ⁤ ⁢ | Michigan (June 8), Martinsville (Oct. 26) | Castrol ⁣⁤ ⁤ ⁢ ⁤ ⁤ ⁤ ⁣ |
## A Season of High Stakes
as the⁣ 2025 NASCAR Cup series unfolds,RFK Racing’s trio of ⁢drivers will be ones to watch.With a ‍mix of veteran ‌experience and rising talent, the‌ team is ready to chase victory on some of the most storied tracks in motorsports. ‍
Stay tuned for more updates as‍ the season progresses, ‍and‍ don’t miss ‌the action-packed races​ that define the heart‍ of ⁢NASCAR.
*For the full 2025 NASCAR Cup ⁢Series schedule, including dates, tracks,​ and TV‍ channels, check out the printable PDF schedule .*
It ⁣seems ⁢like ​your ⁣text got cut off at the end. However, I can help summarize or continue the content based ‌on what you’ve provided so far. Here’s a ​continuation ⁣and ⁤summary of the key ⁢points:
Keselowski’s Quest for Glory Brad⁣ Keselowski, the 2012 Cup ​Champion, enters ⁤his‌ 16th full season in​ the NASCAR Cup Series ⁢with renewed determination. As⁢ a co-owner of RFK Racing, keselowski has been instrumental in the team’s resurgence, both on and off the track. In 2024, he piloted the No. 6 Ford Mustang Dark‍ Horse to ‌victory in the Castrol TOM’s Supra livery, marking a significant‌ milestone for ⁣the team‍ and​ the new Mustang model. Keselowski’s leadership and experience will be⁤ pivotal as ‍RFK Racing aims for more victories and playoff success in 2025.
Buescher’s Momentum chris Buescher,⁢ driver of the No. 17 Ford Mustang, ⁢has ⁤been a consistent performer for RFK‍ Racing. With multiple wins and playoff​ appearances‍ under his ⁢belt,⁤ Buescher is looking to build on his momentum in 2025. His ‌ability to deliver under ⁤pressure and his ‌strong rapport with the team make‌ him a key contender for the championship.
Preece’s Rising Star Ryan Preece,⁢ who ‌joined​ RFK Racing in 2023, has quickly established himself as a rising star in the NASCAR Cup Series. Known for his aggressive driving style and adaptability, preece​ is expected to ⁣make significant strides in 2025. His partnership with Keselowski and Buescher strengthens RFK Racing’s lineup, making the team a formidable force in the⁤ upcoming season.
The ‌Castrol and TA Partnership The⁤ renewed partnership between RFK Racing, castrol, and TravelCenters of America (TA) continues to be a cornerstone of the​ team’s success. Castrol’s iconic branding ⁤will be⁢ prominently displayed on ‍Keselowski’s No. 6 Ford at ‌key races,including the Circuit of the Americas (COTA) ‌and Las Vegas Motor Speedway. Additionally, the collaboration extends ‍beyond the⁤ track, with Castrol Heavy ⁢Duty Lubricants being introduced at TA ​Truck Service⁤ locations, supporting fleet⁤ customers and professional⁢ drivers.
Key Races and Expectations The 2025 NASCAR Cup⁤ Series⁤ schedule features ‌a mix of traditional ovals, road courses, and⁤ superspeedways. RFK Racing’s lineup is well-prepared to tackle the⁢ diverse challenges, with Keselowski, Buescher, and Preece each bringing unique strengths to the table.⁤ Fans can look​ forward to thrilling performances at iconic venues​ like Daytona, Talladega, ⁣and Charlotte.
Looking⁣ Ahead As the 2025 season approaches, RFK Racing is focused ⁤on maintaining its legacy‍ of​ excellence and innovation. The team’s partnership with Castrol and TA, combined with its ‌talented driver lineup, positions RFK Racing as⁣ a top contender for​ the championship. With a ⁣commitment to performance, sustainability, and fan engagement, ⁢RFK Racing is ready to make 2025 a season to remember.
